greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficient of x^n in (1 - (n-1)*x - n*x^2)^n.
comment: Also coefficient of x^n in the expansion of 1/sqrt(1 + 2*(n-1)*x + ((n+1)*x)^2).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..386
formula: a(n) = n! * [x^n] exp((1 - n)*x) * BesselI(0,2*sqrt(-n)*x). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, May 31 2020
program: (Sage) [ hypergeometric([-n, -n], [1], -n).simplify_hypergeometric() for n in (0..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, May 31 2020
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, May 02 2019
